author: Basically Homeless
description:
In this video I build an exoskeleton with 3D printed frame and DIY skateboard motor controller. A camera points at the screen and moves the exoskeleton leaving no evidence to current anti-cheat systems. This means it's definitely not cheating, I promise (trust me bro). 

This video was made possible by Colamy and their newly released Lumidesk. Sponsors like these make videos like this possible! Please consider checking out the desk with my links below to support the channel (they gave my viewers exclusively a 60% discount!):
